name: Requiem Beetle
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 100 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the requiem beetle moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the requiem beetle can make one claw attack against it as a bonus action.

traits.name: Earthshaker
traits.desc: When the requiem beetle moves more than 10 feet in a single turn, creatures within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone as the ground shakes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The requiem beetle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage.
